document.heading: Fire Alarm Systems Regulations Amendment Act of 1987

history.narrative: Law 7-99, the “Fire Alarm Systems Regulations Amendment Act of 1987,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 7-91, which was referred to the Committee on Judiciary. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on January 5, 1988 and January 19, 1988, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on February 9, 1988, it was assigned Act No. 7-143 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
